title: Ugly Sweater 5K and 10K  (Los Angeles)
desc: December is a busy month! While many different holidays are celebrated during December, we wanted to celebrate with an Ugly Sweater 5K and 10K! And raise funds for an amazing charity in the process:  FEED MY STARVING CHILDREN.? *Medals will be shipped out in December 2015.? What: ?Complete a 5K or 10K!? When: ?Complete your race any time between December 1 and December 31, 2015.? Where: ? You choose the course and you time yourself (you?ll report your finishing time to us). Why :? Because we want to celebrate all of the holidays in the month of December, and raise money for a great charity,  FEED MY STARVING CHILDREN. We'd love to raise $8,030 and feed a village of 100 people for a year! How amazing would that be? What donations to Feed My Starving Children do: **If you are a paid MEET ME ON MARS participant you should have received an email with a discount code to use on all of our virtual races this year to save 25% on each race. If you have not received that code email us at moonjoggers@gmail.com.? If? you have not signed up for  MEET ME ON MARS  ( one of the paid registration options) do so now and you?ll be able to save 25% on our virtual races! Sign up? HERE . (Use code SAVE10 to save $10)
